arts.ttl: Jude Bellingham Sends Emotional Message to Real Madrid Fans After Return From Injury Against Espanyol
arts.sum: What made Alonso happy was also seeing Jude Bellingham and Eduardo Camavinga come on for the final minutes of the game. Jude Bellingham Take to Social Media After Espanyol Game

arts.ttl: Karim Benzema sends message to Real Madrid star after Espanyol
arts.sum: Real Madrid legend Karim Benzema has taken to social media, to show his appreciation for a current member of Los Blancos’ ranks. The player in question? Éder Militão. Stopper Militão…

arts.ttl: Mbappé and Militão strike from distance as Real Madrid deals Espanyol first loss
arts.sum: Mbappé has seven goals in six games for Madrid this season, including a double in its 2-1 win over Marseille to start the Champions League on Tuesday. Kylian Mbappé and Éder Militão scored from well outside the area to help Real Madrid ease past Espanyol 2-0 in La Liga on Saturday and deal the Barcelona-based side its first loss.

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso hails two unsung Real Madrid heroes after win over Espanyol

arts.ttl: Real Madrid & Espanyol fans unite to aim abusive chants at Barcelona
arts.sum: Members of the respective fanbases at Real Madrid and Espanyol came together to target a common enemy on Saturday. That’s according to Mundo Deportivo, who point towards Barcelona as the…

arts.ttl: Real Madrid star finished Espanyol clash ‘baffled and very upset’

arts.ttl: Real Madrid megastar confused and angry after substitution vs Espanyol
arts.sum: Real Madrid secured their sixth win of the season in all competitions earlier today when they defeated RCD Espanyol 2-0 at the Santiago Bernabeu. Eder Militao and Kylian Mbappe scored two golazos to secure all three points at the Santiago Bernabeu, but once again, the post-game headlines appear to be surrounding superstar Vinicius Jr. After […] The post Real Madrid megastar confused and angry after substitution vs Espanyol appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post-Match Press Conference After Real Madrid Beat Espanyol in La Liga
arts.sum: Head coach Xabi Alonso spoke to the media after the win and expressed satisfaction with his team's performance. Alonso: Bellingham is an attacking midfielder who can play alongside midfielders and forwards.

arts.ttl: Militao, Carvajal ecstatic after Real Madrid 2-0 Espanyol – ‘It was a special goal’
arts.sum: Real Madrid consolidated their place at the top of the La Liga standings with their fifth win in the competition, beating RCD Espanyol 2-0 at the Santiago Bernabeu today. Two wonderstrikes from Eder Militao and Kylian Mbappe on either side of half-time secured all three points at the Santiago Bernabeu against the Catalan outfit. arts.sum: Real Madrid secured their sixth win of the season – fifth in La Liga – earlier today when they defeated RCD Espanyol 2-0 at the Santiago Bernabeu.
